t: Amazon.com : Kollectaball K-Court - The Fastest Portable Ball Collector for Tennis Balls or Pickleballs : Sports & Outdoors
s: I have tried pickup tubes, baskets and two different rotary pickup tools. This collector is the fastest and best. It is similar to the less-expensive Neewer brand collector, but the K-Court Kollectaball is larger and better. The K-Court holds just over 40 pickleballs, even though it is rated for 30.
